name: Damacreat (isowosi)
description:
You are one of many. You are a Dark Matter Creature, a Damacreat. One of the lowest life forms existing in the vast space of Dark Matter. You have just evolved your first pair of Dark Energy dischargers.

It's eat or be eaten. Survive! Grow! Dominate!

Controls

  • LMB/W: shoot black hole
  • RMB/SPACE: use booster
  • or tap buttons if on touch device
